title: The Puppy Trap
description: Josie, Aiden, and their yellow Labrador siblings Sasha and Zipper were a happy family—until the couple broke up and separated the dogs. One day at the Madrona dog park, Sasha and Zipper switch places, and it isn’t long before Josie and Aiden realize they have taken the wrong dog home. And that, maybe, their break up was wrong as well…At the publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management software (DRM) applied.
author: Elsa Watson
